step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you move them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the position, but try to keep your elbows wider and closer to your head for a better stretch. Remember to keep your head upright.
You're returning to the start position. Focus on maintaining the elbow position as you bring your hands forward.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close to your head when you spread them wide. This helps you get the best stretch for your shoulders and chest.
